summary: An acclaimed writer, his ex-wife, and their teenaged children come to terms with the complexities of love in all its forms over the course of one tumultuous year.
cast: Greg Kinnear|Jennifer Connelly|Lily Collins|Nat Wolff|Kristen Bell|Logan Lerman|Liana Liberato|Michael Goodwin|Stephen King|Rusty Joiner|Patrick Schwarzenegger|David Carzell|Barbara Weetman|Alex ter Avest|Zeeko Zaki|Nate Panning|Katie Garfield|Spencer Breslin|Brandi Nicole Feemster|Glen Powell|Zack Mines|Amber Sheets|Nadiyah Dorsey|Alyssa Bauman|Kristin Mercedes Bence|Roxy Collins|Christopher Cozort|Randy Grazio|Merideth Harrison|Meredith Jackson|Scott Jecha|Matthew Land|Karen Malina|Joe Montanti|Adam Moryto|Christopher Noel|Shannon Plummer-White|Zachary Steffey|Millie Wannamaker|Jelissa Ware|Brad Worch II

title: Un invierno en la playa
